text: "Phyllobrostis" argillosa is a moth in the Lyonetiidae family. It was described from a single male from Kranspoort near Pretoria. It is misplaced in Lyonetiidae and even in Yponomeutoidea. The species should probably be placed in the superfamily Tineoidea, probably in Tineidae. ==External links== *Revision of the genus Phyllobrostis Staudinger, 1859 (Lepidoptera, Lyonetiidae) Category:Lyonetiidae Category:Moths of Africa
title: Phyllobrostis argillosa
